Scrolling¶

This module provides some scrolling-related features.

SASS¶

@mixin smoothscrolling($time:1000)

Can be applied to a link (a HTML tag) that points to a hash. When the link is clicked, the page is crolled to the target in $time ms. Note that this cannot be used in combination with Trigger and the hash in the url will not be updated.

$time

The time in ms.

@mixin scrollareaoffset($offset)

If there are fixed element at the top of the viewport (such as Sticky), jumplinks does not work correctly. This mixin adds an offset to the jumplink. Jumplink correction will be automated in future.

$offset

The offset as an CSS length.

JavaScript¶

$.smoothscrolling_enable(time)¶

Enables the smooth scrolling feature.

Arguments:
  • time (int) – Time in ms.
$.smoothscrolling_disable()¶

Disables the smooth scrolling feature.

$.scrollareaoffset_enable(offset)¶

Enables the scroll area offset feature. (No function at this time.)

Arguments:
  • time (int) – Offset.
$.scrollareaoffset_disable()¶

Disables the scroll area offset feature.

$.scrollareaoffset()¶

Returns the scroll area offset.

Returns:Offset.
